html: Today marks #100Days since I took the oath of office and was sworn in to represent #TX03 in the United States House of Representatives. I’m proud of what we have accomplished so far and can’t wait to continue serving YOU in Congress.pic.twitter.com/3N2nemIt2s
text: Today marks #100Days since I took the oath of office and was sworn in to represent #TX03 in the United States House of Representatives. I’m proud of what we have accomplished so far and can’t wait to continue serving YOU in Congress.pic.twitter.com/3N2nemIt2s

html: #TX03 is home to some of the most inventive companies in the world which is why I'm so excited to join @RepJoeNeguse in launching the Congressional Caucus on Innovation and Entrepreneurship. Together, we'll work to ensure job creators have the resources needed for success.pic.twitter.com/yxM51rNfCV
text: #TX03 is home to some of the most inventive companies in the world which is why I'm so excited to join @RepJoeNeguse in launching the Congressional Caucus on Innovation and Entrepreneurship. html: We had an amazing time with US Congressman Van Taylor today at our McKinney restaurant! Thanks so much Van! #oreillymcd #imlovinitpic.twitter.com/lbbob74Y6N

html: There’s no doubt Collin County residents have been impacted by the recent passport facility closures. However, I appreciate the Dallas Passport Office's swift response to my request & encourage residents to take advantage of these additional services.https://www.dallasnews.com/news/collin-county/2019/04/18/after-controversy-collin-county-passport-offices-state-department-authorizes-additional-services …
text: There’s no doubt Collin County residents have been impacted by the recent passport facility closures. However, I appreciate the Dallas Passport Office's swift response to my request & encourage residents to take advantage of these additional services.https://www.dallasnews.com/news/collin-county/2019/04/18/after-controversy-collin-county-passport-offices-state-department-authorizes-additional-services …

html: As a father, I know the internet is both an incredible tool & a source of concern. Today, I teamed up w/ @GoogleForEdu & @Plano_Schools to provide students at @BowmanRaiders w/ knowledge to mitigate potential risks so they may continue to use the internet safely!pic.twitter.com/WpunYAS11F
text: As a father, I know the internet is both an incredible tool & a source of concern. Today, I teamed up w/ @GoogleForEdu & @Plano_Schools to provide students at @BowmanRaiders w/ knowledge to mitigate potential risks so they may continue to use the internet safely!pic.twitter.com/WpunYAS11F

html: Last week, I sent a letter urging the State Department to reconsider the recent closure of two Passport Acceptance Facilities in Collin County. It’s important for my constituents to have access to convenient, timely passport services.pic.twitter.com/V9Il2E6blG

html: Throughout history, millions of Americans have served in the U.S. Military and thousands have been held as prisoners of war. text: Throughout history, millions of Americans have served in the U.S. Military and thousands have been held as prisoners of war. html: It’s #ChildAbusePreventionMonth & I took to the Floor to highlight the great work being done in #TX03. Each year, @CASACollin helps those impacted by child abuse or neglect navigate a complicated legal system. Because of their dedication, hundreds have a safe place to call home.pic.twitter.com/BU50AINQgp
text: It’s #ChildAbusePreventionMonth & I took to the Floor to highlight the great work being done in #TX03. html: Moments ago I signed a Discharge Petition to force a vote on the Born-Alive Abortion Survivors Protection Act. It's heart wrenching that we are even having this debate. Even in an era of hyper-partisanship, we should all agree on protecting the life of an innocent newborn child.pic.twitter.com/UlRFIUCVcA
text: Moments ago I signed a Discharge Petition to force a vote on the Born-Alive Abortion Survivors Protection Act. It's heart wrenching that we are even having this debate. Even in an era of hyper-partisanship, we should all agree on protecting the life of an innocent newborn child.pic.twitter.com/UlRFIUCVcA

html: As healthcare costs continue to soar, eliminating surprise billing is more important than ever. Today, the Committee on Education and Labor examined this very topic in an effort to tackle the problem in a bipartisan manner.pic.twitter.com/VpnTGc2f6F
text: As healthcare costs continue to soar, eliminating surprise billing is more important than ever. Today, the Committee on Education and Labor examined this very topic in an effort to tackle the problem in a bipartisan manner.pic.twitter.com/VpnTGc2f6F

html: Discussed importance of US – Israel missile defense programs w/ constituents in town from Allen, Frisco, & Plano. text: Discussed importance of US – Israel missile defense programs w/ constituents in town from Allen, Frisco, & Plano. html: Texas law enforcement puts it all on the line to keep our nation, our communities, and our families safe. We owe it to them to give them the resources they need to safely do their job. Congress must work together to solve the crisis at our southern border.https://twitter.com/CollinCoSO/status/1108409456403062784 …
text: Texas law enforcement puts it all on the line to keep our nation, our communities, and our families safe. We owe it to them to give them the resources they need to safely do their job. Congress must work together to solve the crisis at our southern border.https://twitter.com/CollinCoSO/status/1108409456403062784 …

html: Deeply saddened to learn of the terror attack in New Zealand this morning. Praying for the victims and their families, the Christchurch community, and those affected around the world.
text: Deeply saddened to learn of the terror attack in New Zealand this morning. Praying for the victims and their families, the Christchurch community, and those affected around the world.

html: I’m especially proud to highlight a group of women making history in #TX03 during #WomensHistoryMonth. 7 of the 11 judges in Collin County are women. At a time when only 33% of judges in the U.S. are women Collin County is leading the way for women in law and justice careers.pic.twitter.com/xDCSFGWCOP

html: A legislative giant and an American hero, Congressman Ralph Hall will be greatly missed by all who knew him. I had the privilege of knowing Congressman Hall, who also represented a portion of Collin County in Congress, and know our loss is heaven’s gain today.
text: A legislative giant and an American hero, Congressman Ralph Hall will be greatly missed by all who knew him. I had the privilege of knowing Congressman Hall, who also represented a portion of Collin County in Congress, and know our loss is heaven’s gain today.

html: Today’s massive spending bill lumped together many of Washington’s worst traits to spend $328B buried in 1,200 pages w/ less than 24 hours to review. If we are going to get our nation back on track – we need to change the way DC operates & bring our Texas solutions to Congress.
text: Today’s massive spending bill lumped together many of Washington’s worst traits to spend $328B buried in 1,200 pages w/ less than 24 hours to review. If we are going to get our nation back on track – we need to change the way DC operates & bring our Texas solutions to Congress.

html: They do things differently in Washington than we do in Texas. Received bill text for the spending agreement less than 24 hours ago - working my way through 1,169 pages.pic.twitter.com/eP981AWfUS
text: They do things differently in Washington than we do in Texas. Received bill text for the spending agreement less than 24 hours ago - working my way through 1,169 pages.pic.twitter.com/eP981AWfUS

html: Beginning 46 years ago today, 591 American POWs were released between February and March from Hanoi, North Vietnam during Operation Homecoming. Amongst them, former #TX03 Congressman Sam Johnson: the embodiment of an American hero.pic.twitter.com/cyqSqs33zU
text: Beginning 46 years ago today, 591 American POWs were released between February and March from Hanoi, North Vietnam during Operation Homecoming. Amongst them, former #TX03 Congressman Sam Johnson: the embodiment of an American hero.pic.twitter.com/cyqSqs33zU

html: Tonight, @POTUS reminded us that extraordinary bipartisan accomplishments are possible and I couldn't agree more. text: Tonight, @POTUS reminded us that extraordinary bipartisan accomplishments are possible and I couldn't agree more. html: As border security negotiations get underway, I stopped by @NBCDFW to discuss our options moving forward. As a Marine, I served at the US - Mexico border. Physical borders work & must be part of the solution when it comes to protecting Americans..http://bit.ly/2WD4LBY
text: As border security negotiations get underway, I stopped by @NBCDFW to discuss our options moving forward. As a Marine, I served at the US - Mexico border. Physical borders work & must be part of the solution when it comes to protecting Americans..http://bit.ly/2WD4LBY

html: There is still time to participate in my Valentines for Veterans Program! Simply create valentines for local veterans and drop them off at my Plano office. My team and I will hand-deliver each valentine to veterans at the North Texas VA. INFO: http://bit.ly/2GbscN4 pic.twitter.com/3XGCTEOo6x
text: There is still time to participate in my Valentines for Veterans Program! Simply create valentines for local veterans and drop them off at my Plano office. My team and I will hand-deliver each valentine to veterans at the North Texas VA. INFO: http://bit.ly/2GbscN4 pic.twitter.com/3XGCTEOo6x

html: Introduced legislation w/ Rep. @Malinowski to limit US troop reduction in Syria. I served in Iraq where we lived the creed, “leave no one behind” - This applies to Americans fighting overseas as well as those fighting with us for the cause. INFO: http://bit.ly/TX03Syria pic.twitter.com/hTMBAtr4Wy
text: Introduced legislation w/ Rep. @Malinowski to limit US troop reduction in Syria. I served in Iraq where we lived the creed, “leave no one behind” - This applies to Americans fighting overseas as well as those fighting with us for the cause. html: This week I cosponsored H.R. 20, the No Taxpayer Funding For Abortion Act and H.R. 369, the Defund Planned Parenthood Act. As a father, I know how precious life is and will do everything in my power to protect innocent human life in Congress.pic.twitter.com/9H0D98xBbt
text: This week I cosponsored H.R. 20, the No Taxpayer Funding For Abortion Act and H.R. 369, the Defund Planned Parenthood Act. As a father, I know how precious life is and will do everything in my power to protect innocent human life in Congress.pic.twitter.com/9H0D98xBbt

text: Tune in to 1160 AM KBDT now as I join @JPKathyandCrew live from Washington, DC - discussing government shutdown and border security.

html: Today, I delivered remarks on the @HouseFloor for the first time. I'm honored to speak from this historic dais & for the opportunity to recognize my predecessor, Rep. Sam Johnson. While I will never be able to fill his shoes, I hope to follow in his footsteps. #TX03pic.twitter.com/p8lpkRHUsC
text: Today, I delivered remarks on the @HouseFloor for the first time. I'm honored to speak from this historic dais & for the opportunity to recognize my predecessor, Rep. Sam Johnson. While I will never be able to fill his shoes, I hope to follow in his footsteps. #TX03pic.twitter.com/p8lpkRHUsC

html: U.S. national debt is at $21.9 trillion. The first bill I cosponsored in Congress proposes a balanced budget amendment to the US Constitution. Americans have to balance their pocketbook, the State of Texas balances its budget, & so should the Federal government.pic.twitter.com/0Rts4Rmyq6
text: U.S. national debt is at $21.9 trillion. The first bill I cosponsored in Congress proposes a balanced budget amendment to the US Constitution. Americans have to balance their pocketbook, the State of Texas balances its budget, & so should the Federal government.pic.twitter.com/0Rts4Rmyq6

html: Disappointed Congress is heading home for another weekend while the government shutdown continues - but I’ll be on the phones with Republicans and Democrats. Both sides should be working around the clock for the American people.
text: Disappointed Congress is heading home for another weekend while the government shutdown continues - but I’ll be on the phones with Republicans and Democrats. Both sides should be working around the clock for the American people.

html: Participated in a meeting at the White House to discuss border security this morning. It’s an incredible privilege to represent #TX03 in Congress and ensure Collin County has a seat at the table.pic.twitter.com/SBS63Z4Hp9
text: Participated in a meeting at the White House to discuss border security this morning. It’s an incredible privilege to represent #TX03 in Congress and ensure Collin County has a seat at the table.pic.twitter.com/SBS63Z4Hp9

html: Tune in to @660KSKY now as I join @MarkDavis to discuss the government shutdown, my first week in Congress, and how I plan to make Washington work again.
text: Tune in to @660KSKY now as I join @MarkDavis to discuss the government shutdown, my first week in Congress, and how I plan to make Washington work again.

html: After taking the oath this afternoon, I sent a letter to the CAO requesting my salary be withheld until Congress ends the government shutdown. Members of Congress should not be paid when critical federal employees, including our border patrol agents, are denied their paychecks.pic.twitter.com/fsngMonQbE
text: After taking the oath this afternoon, I sent a letter to the CAO requesting my salary be withheld until Congress ends the government shutdown. Members of Congress should not be paid when critical federal employees, including our border patrol agents, are denied their paychecks.pic.twitter.com/fsngMonQbE

html: Honored to be sworn in to the 116th Congress today and proud to represent #TX03 in the U.S. House of Representatives!pic.twitter.com/n9dAoWICjS
text: Honored to be sworn in to the 116th Congress today and proud to represent #TX03 in the U.S. House of Representatives!pic.twitter.com/n9dAoWICjS
